ActivityMetadata.Name: PD Create a business service
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD Create a business service
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Create a new business service.
Business services model capabilities that span multiple technical services and that may be owned by several different teams.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#business-services)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

Create a business service

Create a new business service. Business services model capabilities that span multiple technical services and that may be owned by several different teams. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#business-services)

Method: Post

OperationID: createBusinessService

EndPoint:

/business_services
